definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

sentences.english: The car has a rustproof coating.
An excellent antioxidant anticorrosive performance, prolongs the service life of the equipment.
sentences.chinese: 优良的抗氧防锈性能，延长设备使用寿命。

sentences.english: Now I see. these element must is helpful in prevent rust.
sentences.chinese: 现在我明白了，这些元素一定是能够防锈的。

sentences.english: Cylindrical guide pillar--chromium plating and anticorrosive treating.
sentences.chinese: 圆柱形导柱，镀铬防锈处理。

sentences.english: With manufacturer's standard corrosion-resistant primer complying with applicable standards applied immediately after surface preparation and pretreatment.
sentences.chinese: 钢件在经过表面预处理后，应按相应标准涂防锈漆。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a long-acting emulsion-type antirust fluid used for metal rust prevention.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及用于金属防锈的长效乳化型防锈液。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a long-acting emulsion-type antirust fluid used for metal rust prevention.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及用于金属防锈的长效乳化型防锈液。

sentences.english: Potential variation of rust preventing oil film after its degradation was studied by using wire beam electrode.
sentences.chinese: 采用丝束电极研究防锈油膜失效之前的电位变化。

sentences.english: Ray painted below the waterline with a special anti- rust paint.
sentences.chinese: 雷用专门的防锈涂料涂船的吃水线以下的部位。

sentences.english: We have painted the operating platform with anticorrosive paint.
sentences.chinese: 对车间钢结构操作平台涂刷防锈漆，做防锈处理。

sentences.english: We have painted the operating platform with anticorrosive paint.
sentences.chinese: 对车间钢结构操作平台涂刷防锈漆，做防锈处理。

sentences.english: Quantity of water solubilization by rust inhibitors was calculated based on the phase digram .
sentences.chinese: 在相图测定的基础上，计算出防锈剂对水的增溶度。

sentences.english: INTECH PROTECT 410 protects exposed metal components against corrosion, particularly protects against fingerprint (hand perspiration) corrosion.
sentences.chinese: 适用于光亮金属防锈，尤其是对抗手汗的防锈。

sentences.english: INTECH PROTECT 410 protects exposed metal components against corrosion, particularly protects against fingerprint (hand perspiration) corrosion.
sentences.chinese: 适用于光亮金属防锈，尤其是对抗手汗的防锈。

sentences.english: Development work of the material manufacturers has been focused on developing stronger VCI chemicals.
sentences.chinese: 包装材料的制造商正在研发防锈功能更强的化学品。

sentences.english: The requirement and application prospects of oil-free rustproof packaging are summarized as well.
sentences.chinese: 同时对无油防锈包装的需求及应用前景也作了概述。

definition: the coating of sth that has been chrome-plated or copper-plated etc
